briefTitle: Remission in Subjects With Crohn's Disease, 1 Year Phase
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study of the Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab for the Maintenance of Clinical Remission in Subjects With Crohn's Disease

arms.label: Double-blind adalimumab 40 mg every other week (eow)

summary: The objectives were: (1) To demonstrate the efficacy of adalimumab in the maintenance of clinical remission up to 56 weeks in participants with Crohn's disease who participated in NCT00055523; (2) To delineate the safety of adalimumab when administered to participants with Crohn's disease up to 56 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Randomized Participants Achieving Clinical Remission at Week 56 - Non-Responder Imputation (NRI)

effectByArm.arm: DB Adalimumab 40 mg Every Other Week (Eow)
